text:
Created attachment 32921
Optimization on the AsyncBtach sender

I've made optimzation on the AsyncBatch sender, to send sampler more often when the activity is low, and regroup more sampler when activity is hight, in order to not overload the network.
creator: mchassagneux@apache.org
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: Using this patch would make test unfair.

(In reply to Philippe Mouawad from comment #1)
> Using this patch would make test unfair.

I don't understand what you mean by "unfair"? I use this optimization for  about 1 year with around a hundred of distributed tests without problem.
creator: mchassagneux@apache.org
